author: gertjan68
title: too bad they aren't available anymore
review:
I bought this set when i was a child, about 30 years ago. I love the low-angled roofs you can build with them. Perfect for Alpine style houses (Swiss, Austria, South Germany) or to build a different looking roof, mixing the two angles as is often sen in houses built in the 1930's in the Netherlands. 

I can't remember the price, but it can't be much, since i bought it from my pocket money. Now i wish i had gotten more of these sets, especially since my oldest son will soon be playing with my 30-35 yo Lego blocks :D

over time you will appreciate the possibilities these stones have, hence the 5/5 on all items.
